channel.title: Pages on DDOG
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on DDOG

item.title: About
item.description: Dutch Dog 🐩🐶🐕🐕‍🦺 Welcome to the website for the Dutch DevOps & Github community! Mission We want to create a community for content related to DevOps and GitHub. We believe GitHub has a lot to offer and deserves a focus group in the Netherlands. But we also love the different elements that enable DevOps. So we decided to combine those two into the community you are looking at. We want to provide a platform where we can teach, learn and meet each other.
